name: Ski Game (APirateHat)
description:
Get the skiers down the hill safely!

More of a toy than a game as there's really no goal to it. You can drag the points around and create hills and jumps and watch if the skiers can make it down.

Controls:

Move lines with left mouse button. Move camera with WASD or arrow keys, Enter to center the camera. Delete Skiers with right click. Scroll to zoom in and out.

Reload the page to reset the game

Shortcut buttons:

Spacebar to spawn skier

Q to hide points

E toggles circle selection
